column2: "Leader, are you free? I've been given an ideal mission to show off the power of Weaponoids."
"The mission is \"Transformer Takedown\". Other ARKS will be nearby on the same quest. Let's show them what we can do."

"I would like to accompany you on that mission. Why do soulless automatons fight...
I hope to learn the answer by crossing blades with them."

"Of course. I planned to bring you along from the start. Yes...
Your instinct for destruction will make you very useful on this mission.
Follow me, Elder Pain."

"Ignis, Leader, my thanks. It's time...
Time for you all to see the power I have within me!!"
